description.en: Google AI Studio is a developer platform that lets you quickly prototype and build applications using Google's next-generation, multimodal generative AI models, known as Gemini.

settings.title: Privacy Mode
settings.description: Hides all information from your presence.

settings.title: Show Prompt/Chat Name
settings.description: Displays the name of the current prompt or chat you are working on.

settings.title: Show Model Name
settings.description: Displays the AI model being used (e.g., Gemini 1.5 Pro).

settings.title: Show Voice Name (Stream / Gemini Live)
settings.description: Displays the voice used during a stream or live session.

settings.title: Show Token Count
settings.description: Displays the token count of your input/output.
